snippet: Student teachers at the University of Massachusetts are protesting a new national licensure procedure being developed by the education company Pearson and Stanford University.
abstract: Michael Winerip On Education column details protest by student teachers at the University of Massachusetts, who oppose a national teacher licensing procedure being developed by the education company Pearson and Stanford University; notes that the procedure, which will be adopted in several states, de-emphasizes classroom observation.
lead_paragraph: Student teachers at the University of Massachusetts are protesting a new national licensure procedure being developed by the education company Pearson and Stanford University.

headline.print_headline: Move to Outsource Teacher Licensing Process Draws Protest
headline.seo: New Procedure for Teaching License Draws Protest
headline.main: Move to Outsource Teacher Licensing Process Draws Protest
